name: Reportman.PDF
summary: PDF reporting engine with IDE integration for Delphi and C++Builder.
description: Reportman PDF is a reporting engine implemented in Delphi. The package installs into the Delphi and C++Builder IDE on Windows only, while the generated runtime binaries are portable across supported platforms: Windows 32-bit/64-bit, Linux, and Android. On Windows it uses VCL-based font measurement, and on non-Windows platforms it relies on HarfBuzz-based text shaping.
